Event.Text:
After returning the message, coordinates appeared on our map.
A days trip later, we reached a fortified scrap yard in the dead of night. Turning our rovers lights out, we made a stealthy approach.
One crew member scouted the small compound, and noted that there were 6 bandits scattered around, one of which having a blade protruding out of an amputated left arm.
This was the tell tale sign of the bandit called Razor whom the bounty was placed upon. He sat on a chair, whistling and sharpening his blade.

Choice.Text: Open fire from cover, hoping to take the bandits by surprise
It's too risky, we decide to leave and let someone else take this bounty
{Ex-Bandit} Trick the gang into lowering their guard, and attacking them.
